title: is anyone else having this issue?
body: i was suddenly logged out of league and i opened it again and it says that theirs a patch update and when i press okay it says something has gone wrong and i click restart and still does the same thing plz help

replies.body: It sounds like this might have been caused by the weird patch issue we ran into earlier this morning and last night. Let us know in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you still can't get patched and we should be able to help!
